About

September 5, 2018

Hi I’m Chris Wilson and I am a curious person who wants to know more and share it. I live in Krakow, Poland (UTC+1).

For my day job I work as a content writer for an advertising technology company. I’m also a Christian, Sketchnoter, and heavy iPad user.

On Micro.Blog I like to write about technology, mostly iOS, photos and graphics and share ideas I find in books and want to explore. I also share what I found curious or interesting, sometimes with no real benefit to anyone. I want to learn and I know I’m wrong about something (most things?) but don’t know what yet.

I use the pronouns He/him and I’m a married CIS male.

My site is hosted by Micro.blog
